name: learning-grids
description: Design Grids using popular libraries in CSS3, Less, Sass, Rework and Postcss
author: Priyatam Mudivarti

scripts.build:susy: node-sass susy/index.scss -o susy/build --source-map-embed && node-sass susy/samples.scss -o susy/build --source-map-embed
scripts.build:skel: node-sass skel/styles/style.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/style-xsmall.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/style-small.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/style-medium.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/style-large.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/style-xlarge.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embed & node-sass skel/styles/*.scss -o skel/build --source-map-embe
scripts.watch:less: nodemon --watch bootstrap --watch flexbox --watch frameless --watch gridism --ext less --exec 'npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:flexbox && npm run build:frameless && npm run build:gridism'
scripts.watch:sass: nodemon --watch susy/*.scss --watch skel/styles/*.scss --ext scss --exec 'npm run build:susy & npm run build:skel'
scripts.start:less: npm run watch:less & npm run live-server
scripts.start:sass: npm run watch:sass & npm run live-server
scripts.start: npm run watch:less & npm run watch:sass & npm run live-server
